title: PERSON OF INTEREST || Best quotes season 1
author: Natsheliak
comment:
Another great one, in season 2 I think. Reese is working on his rifle in the library, next to Finch.
Finch: Must you do that in here?
Reese: When I do it in the park, people look at me funny
Finch on those drugs had me dying lol
You missed where finch and reese were arguing like a married couple when the baby had a gas grenade
"wanna hack the Pentagon" is my favourite line

1:48 reese:here have some chocolate
       root: would this help to produce an adrenaline respond
       reese: no but they taste good 
he is so awesome
description: Some of my favorite moments and best quotes of the show. There are so many! I probably forgot some... Feel free to tell me, I'll make a part two xD
